meanings.definition: To determine the total number of something.
meanings.sent1: I counted the apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: She counted the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The cat counted the birds flying by.
meanings.sent4: His smile counted more than any words.
meanings.sent5: The teacher counted the pencils to check if any were missing.

meanings.definition: To be of importance or worth.
meanings.sent1: Her opinion counted in the decision-making process.
meanings.sent2: Your effort really counts in this project.
meanings.sent3: The dog's bark counted as a warning.
meanings.sent4: His promise counted as a bond between them.
meanings.sent5: The team knew every player's contribution counted towards victory.
